question:
In light of India’s contribution to UN-HABITAT’s 2020 programs, consider the following statements:
  1. UN-HABITAT is headquartered in Geneva.
  2. UN-HABITAT was established by the Habitat Agenda.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: UN-HABITAT is headquartered in Nairobi, Kenya at the United Nations Office. The United Nations Human Settlements Programme is aimed at development of human settlement and sustainable urban development. It seeks to make cities more resilient, safer and sustainable. Recently, India contributed 150,000 USD for its 2020 programs. Statement 2 is incorrect: The UN-HABITAT was established in 1978. This was the result of Habitat I conference (I UN Conference on Human Settlement and Sustainable Urban Development) in 1976. The Habitat Agenda gives the mandate of the body. This was adopted in 1996 in Istanbul at the Habitat II conference.
